New Records: Dunith Wellalage scored an unbeaten 67 off 65
Wanindu Hasaranga and Charith Asalanka took three wickets each
Key Match Events: India managed to tied to level the score Sri Lanka on 2 August, but lost all the wickets
Pre-Game Insights: Gautam Gambhir on Rohit - Virat's future
Charith Asalanka is one of our best players, says coach Sanath Jayasuriya
Rohit Sharma's special message ahead of start of ODI series
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma said that it looked like a good surface and he was fine with batting second here
Rohit Sharma said, 'You get asked a lot whether this series is a preparation for the World Cup, or is this a preparation for the Champions Trophy'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The second ODI will take place on Sunday from the same stadium in Colombo
India and Sri Lanka have played 168 ODI cricket matches against each other
India have won all of the last 5 matches against Sri Lanka
